title: Ibn Yunus
summary: Abu al-Hasan 'Ali ibn 'Abd al-Rahman ibn Ahmad ibn Yunus al-Sadafi al-Misri (Arabic: ابن يونس; c. 950 – 1009) was an important Egyptian astronomer and mathematician,[1][2][3] whose works are noted for being ahead of their time, having been based on meticulous calculations and attention to detail.
